page.title: 11HOME LIFE
page.content: School Meals 20 years ago were very filling but often not very good for you. Our school chef tries to provide a balanced meal. We have lots of {yogurt}and few sponges. People are aware of being{overweight}to-day. Lots of people work in offices so don't burn up calories. They shouldn't eat large meals. We have lots of preservatives and artificial colourings in our food and eat refined flours.{Health food shops}sell food free from artificial sweetener, colouring and preservatives. Adverts on television tell us to eat margarine which is lower in cholesterol than butter. The{favourite foods}in our school survey was roast meat and hamburgers with chips. Others loved clams,cold custard,spaghetti,chinese and indian food.
